item.description:
I really want to go to the Rockstar Energy Drink UPROAR Festival and I know most of my friends cannot afford to go or are busy or don't care for the bands. Anyone want to join me??? Bands: Avenged Sevenfold Three Days Grace Seether Bullet for My Valentine Escape the Fate lawn tickets are $24 a piece including fees and parking . www.livenation.com


I have been doing research into it but so far no news on when parking opens up or when the gates opne or when who plays when.... I will update the site as soon as I know but plan for lots of rocking music all day long... we should figrue out carpooling now - I can cram 7 other people into my truck. lol :) and want to be there to catch all of the bands.
item.name: Rockstar Energy Drink UPROAR Festival
